mixed-citation.named-content: Desplatsia caudata A. Chev., syn. nov.
mixed-citation.article-title: A taxonomic revision of the African genus Desplatsia Bocq. (Malvaceae - Grewioideae)

tp:taxon-treatment.tp:nomenclature:
Desplatsia caudata Pierre ex A.Chev.
syn. nov.

tp:treatment-sec.p:
We have identified the specimen as
Duboscia macrocarpa Bocq.
and suggest
Desplatsia caudata Pierre ex A.Chev.
as a new synonym for
Duboscia macrocarpa Bocq.
